channel.title: How are you going to pass the time for Black Mesa's release?
channel.description:
As the title says, how are you guys going to pass the time until the mod releases? Personally, I'm going to do the following:
[u]Finish replaying Half-Life.[/u] -I really gotta finish repeating this.
[u]Continue playing Mass Effect 3.[/u] -It's not as good as the 1st and 2nd, but I just got it...
[u]Watch really dumb movies.[/u] -I don't know why I'm doing this.
[u]Try to watch more Youtube.[/u] -It kinda works.
[u][url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLECEA3BEABF6E6AEC&feature=view_all']Do my mini marathon about Half-Life mods and other cool stuff and comment about them.[/url][/u] Press the link to see what I mean.

item.title: How are you going to pass the time for Black Mesa's release?
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
I play a lot of Company of Heroes. And also spend more time in the forums, I’m really interested in Half Life. There are some things I want to understand, like, why the fuck is Apprehension flooded, or why there are two nuclear warheads in a storage full of trip mines? Are the HECU suicide or what? Nevermind.

item.source: How are you going to pass the time for Black Mesa's release?

item.title: How are you going to pass the time for Black Mesa's release?
item.dc:creator: lunertexcosmo
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Schoolwork, schoolwork, schoolwork…

This

I just started school myself. Unfortunately, I take a Spanish and Computer class on Friday that if I miss, the instructors like me to make up any work after class. So it’s better just to go when I’m supposed to rather than coming in on my own time.

danielsangeo:

I am attempting to beat HL1 on hard (I’m not a very good gamer and I’ve died several times by the vorts in Office Complex for example) before the mod comes out.

This too. Just got to WGH.

PlausibleSarge:

Dota 2

If I have the time to figure that freaking game out, yeah. Love it, but it’s got the biggest learning curve ever. :fffuuu:

GordonFreeManz:

then uh watching Freeman’s Mind, Barney’s Mind, and Shepard’s Mind again…

Never cared to much for Shepard and Barney. Don’t know why. But definitely going to watch some Freeman’s mind.

Also wanted to add, Star Wars Battlefront 2, Star Wars: Republic Commando, and as said above HL: Source on hard but with the old strafe lean enabled.

And on the day of, I’ll wake up at five, boot up my PC, start downloading, shower, install, maybe short breakfast if time allows, then play til 6:55 and leave at 7:00 AM for class. Yes, I have my entire week centered around one game. Don’t judge me. I’ve been mentally preparing for this day for a long time. But I know the regulars on this site have been too.

Read full topic

item.title: How are you going to pass the time for Black Mesa's release?
item.dc:creator: Insomniak
item.description:
GordonFreeManz:

I just got a PS2, Half-Life PS2, Timesplitters 1 PS2, Star Wars Battlefront 2 PS2, and Return to Castle Wolfenstein PS2… I also got it with a Dualshock 2 and a 8MB Memory Card… I’m pretty happy. :3 I’ll pass the time like that.

It’s good to know that I’m not the only one who still plays PS2 .

My ps3, however, has been collecting dust for about 4 months.
